pageContext.claim: “Senator Dicky Durbin totally misrepresented what was said at the DACA meeting. Deals can’t get made when there is no trust! Durbin blew DACA and is hurting our Military.”
pageContext.analysis: Durbin publicly said that Trump used the term "shithole" when referring to Africa. Sen. Lindsey Graham (R-S.C.) was not as specific but he said that he spoke "his piece" after Trump used derogatory language about developing countries. There are reporters that Trump bragged in calls about using the term, believing it would win favor with his base voters.
